title: spmregister
description: Registers a volume to its FreeSurfer anatomical using SPM's spm_coreg

subjid.title: Subject ID
subjid.description: Id of the subject as found in SUBJECTS_DIR. This is converted to analyze using mri_convert.

mov.title: Movable volume
mov.description: Volume identifier of the movable volume. Must be specified in a way suitable for mri_convert.

reg.title: Registration file
reg.description: Output registration file. Maps RAS in the reference to RAS in the movable.

frame.title: Frame number
frame.description: Use something other than the first frame. Specify the frame number you want.

mid_frame.title: Middle frame flag
mid_frame.description: Use the middle frame of the mov volume as the template.

template_out.title: Template output
template_out.description: Save the mov template when template is something other than the first frame.

force_ras.title: Force RAS flag
force_ras.description: Force input geometry to be RAS.

outvol.title: Output volume
outvol.description: Resample mov and save as outvol.
